title: Strengthening Competencies in Meta-Analysis of Educational Research Methodologies and Qualitative Research Synthesis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic research methodologies and statistical analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning of research methodologies specialized for language education fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design meta-analysis procedures considering contexts of diverse educational research.
Learners can apply methods to interpret research patterns in the IDT field through qualitative research synthesis.
Learners can utilize data visualization and analysis techniques for research data in small mobile device environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
